channel.title: The strongest armies
channel.description:
Now we all alrady no that it is USA. (Most likely)
But who would win in a super war??? North korea+Russia vs America??
If America wasn't around who would rule? Who would win in an attemptet at a holocaust? Can USA end europe in a holocaust? Who would dominate strength, power, and richness?
DEBATE !!!!!!!!

item.title: The strongest armies
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:84, topic:233416”][quote author=R.I.P RSC link=topic=307817.msg2478258#msg2478258 date=1223396882]

Everyone needs to stop quoting George Orwell like you’re the only person on Earth who has read his fricken books. Quoting him does not make you look clever!

Can you tell me who told you that America gave Germany weapons in WWII?
[/quote]

My history teacher… and they may not have given them to Germany but they gave them to both sides of the war… I think it was China.[/quote]

China wasn’t involved in WW2.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

This can’t go anywhere fast.

At the end of the day, it’s like putting 8 different people into a cage and telling them to fight to the death. Predictions can be made, but random occurrences and so many other factors effecting it just have too much unpredictable impact on the result.

Prepubescent patriots also don’t help the argument.

item.title: The strongest armies
item.dc:creator: @army_life army_life
item.description:
@army_life wrote:

[quote=“bowserjr2, post:87, topic:233416”][quote author=Frell link=topic=307817.msg2477784#msg2477784 date=1223345554]
Hitler wanted to rule the world and blamed the jews for something they didnt do.

Slavery was common but it was a result of being lazy.
[/quote]
Hitler was like a spoilt kid, he got for to long time as he want from rest of the world.
And started war when things did not go as he want.

You only simi-answered my question.

here Ill quickly answer the rest of the question (Very basic)

World war 2:

  1. Dictator Hitler died and lost power over Germany setting jews free again.
  2. Allied forces stopped the advancing Axis powers
  3. Tons of technological benefits.

Civil war:

  1. Set the slaves free from the confederate states
  2. Brought a splitting country together once and for all

need I go on?

Now… we need a war to bring down the USA’s regime…

Agree.

The War against WAR agaist terror.
But with a plan this time.

And make real democracy in US.[/quote]

I agree

mission one: Teach the kids of Norway to spell.

item.title: The strongest armies
item.dc:creator: @army_life army_life
item.description:
@army_life wrote:

[quote=“Matty`m, post:79, topic:233416”][quote author=army_life link=topic=307817.msg2477999#msg2477999 date=1223374548]

And who will do that? The UK or Finland lul
[/quote]
You’re just another bigheaded american who thinks they are > * and no-one can beat them, if you wouldn’t have took the atom bomb from us you would have never defeated japan.[/quote]

No I am not of course we can always be defeated but we will win a war against Britain outnumber and out power the British forces 3/1. (Cough the revolutionary way dumb shits we already have and that probably won’t happen seeing how America and Britain are close allies.)

[quote=“Greeny, post:85, topic:233416”]army_life, you failed to respond to my post at the bottom of page 3.

Clearly you’re an example of what I described in that post; an undereducated patriot.

Your responses suck, you think America won every war alone. However when you do go it alone you fuck up majorly cough Vietnam.

Britain hasn’t lost a major war in over half a millennium, which is more than can be said for the Amerifags.[/quote]

When did I say that?

Amerifags
lol thats just showing your ignorance but its ok its amusing to see you make a fool of yourself with the 'death to America shit' And that's because you guys have not been in a 'Major' war and most people also say that 'America' is loosing the war well you guys help us too you have the 2nd most troops in so if we loose... you loose. You are totally oblivious to the fact that you guys WOULD HAVE LOST THE WAR if it was not for american interference not all us but we put a wedge between the German advance to london.

ps: http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/uknews/1567303/Afghanistan-is-lost,-says-Lord-Ashdown.html

war can be good for scientific advancement

list of technologies i can think of that were had massive advancement as a result of war.

  1. computer science
  2. bleach/cleaning producs
  3. a lot of chemicals process. ammonia/chlorine/polymers/aluminium
  4. nuclear power
  5. flight
  6. space exploration
    the list could go on

for all americans who think they are > *, just look at your economic system.

i think there are better things then war though, the pen is mightier then sword
